Kai (former province located in present-day Yamanashi Prefecture)
reason for living, something one lives for, purpose in life, raison d'être
first and second, A and B
superiority and (or) inferiority, distinction (in quality), discernment, discrimination
shell (of crab, tortoise, etc.), carapace, plastron

x: 甲乙丙・こうおつへい

sense.gloss: treble range (in Japanese music), high note
first sign of the Chinese calendar
top board (of a table, counter, etc.), surface
rhinoceros beetle (esp. the Japanese rhinoceros beetle, Trypoxylus dichotomus)
resourcefulness, ability (esp. to earn a living), dependability, reliability
armor, armour, armor plate, armour plate
brisk and efficient, diligent, devoted, spirited
first division of the night (approx. 7pm to 9pm)

sdata.j: ↑苦心↑↓くしん↓の↑甲斐↑↓かい↓があった。

sdata.j: ↑乙↑↓おつ↓が↑受託↑↓じゅたく↓↑業務↑↓ぎょうむ↓の↑実施↑↓じっし↓により↑得↑↓え↓た↑成果↑↓せいか↓は、↑甲乙↑↓こうおつ↓↑双方↑↓そうほう↓に↑帰属↑↓きぞく↓するものとする。
sdata.e: Any result obtained through the execution of the Commissioned Business shall belong to each party hereto.

sdata.j: この↑間↑↓かん↓↑投稿↑↓とうこう↓した↑記事↑↓きじ↓がやっと↑雑誌↑↓ざっし↓に↑載↑↓の↓ったんだよ。↑頑張↑↓がんば↓って↑出↑↓だ↓し↑続↑↓つづ↓けた↑甲斐↑↓かい↓があったよ。

sdata.j: ↑甲↑↓かぶと↓の↑損↑↓そん↓は↑乙↑↓おつ↓の↑得↑↓とく↓。
